name: Changes in R&D due to the coronavirus pandemic, by selected industry and R&D activity, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2020
description: Changes in R&D due to the coronavirus pandemic, by selected industry and R&D activity, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_new_r_d_project_were_started
variableMeasured.description: New R D Project Were Started

variableMeasured.name: field_existing_r_d_projects_were_canceled
variableMeasured.description: Existing R D Projects Were Canceled

variableMeasured.name: field_existing_r_d_projects_were_disrupted
variableMeasured.description: Existing R D Projects Were Disrupted

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Only companies in the following NAICS (North American Industrial Classification System) sectors and industries are included in this table: 31–33, 42, 51, 5413, 5415, and 5417. Industry classification is based on dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2021 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2020.
